post.body: You bet cleaning for company is good exercise. That's why I invite people over.
A 30-second workout? How about FitFast?
What a sky in that photo!
I mean more info about mindful eating, not the article.
U R welcome. Article supposed to be in Better Health & Living, PHX edition, this month. More info here: http://www.tcme.org/
Try this instead: http://www.amihungry.com/. Science says diets don't work long-term. I wrote about this; it's mindful eating.
That's what I was thinking. Ha! I clicked on Meagan's name.
Don't think I won't think about coming 2 the seacoast. Was just at Maine's in October. Absolutely beautiful. Loved it.
The stew looks yummy. I'm making chicken soup today. Love both in the winter!
My kids are grown, and I still like the Family Bed. Sweet.
My DD wrote a parody about Siddartha in high school. Had to do with shoes. Funny and clever.
Does Twitter let you know if your account was hacked? I got your message. No worries. I deleted it, thanks to the Twitter msg.
Good morning 2 you. And 2 everyone else out there as well...though, on the east coast it's near lunchtime. Make it a good 1.
I think I'm pretty remarkable (smile).
If I lived on the coast, I think I'd be over the top happy, too!
I read the article you linked us to: How to be the right kind of different. Interesting and helpful. Makes me think. Thanks.
Thanks for the link to the Happiness Score. How fun! I scored "ridiculously happy." I'm glad.
I complain today, "Google never finds my travel blog." 2day I show up in a "Phoenix travel" Google alert. But it's my BIKE blog. Go figure!
On the home page, I like the list of icons under the word Followers. All the colors, photos, graphics. It would make a cool poster.
Don't ask why, but I was going for the 200 mark this AM. Passed it, thanks to all of my new followers. Thanks!
